page.description: Create a copy of an object instance.
page.original:
SQL::Schema::Clone() Syntax &ltCopy> as SQL::Schema = &ltSQL::Schema>.Clone() ArgumentDescription &ltCopy>A new SQL::Schema object. &ltSQL::Schema>A SQL::Schema created with a DIM statement.
Description The SQL::Schema.Clone() method makes a copy of a SQL::Schema object and its properties. See Also SQL::Schema Object Limitations
